title: tAyaTra pErkellAm
sahitya:
tAyaTra pErkellAm tAi Anavan kandan tuNaiyaTra pErkkellAm tuNaiyAnavan


anupallavi

  nOyaTra vAzhvum kuraivaTra selvamum koDukkinra vEndan koDai vaLLal  kandan


caraNam    anji anji iruppAr anjudalait-tIrppAn Anandap-peru vAzhvil aDiyArai sErppAn
kunjari maNavALan kunrakkuDi vElan kumbiDuvArkk-aruLum kumaran guNashIlan
